headline: GTA Online
subtitle: GTA Online Import/Export Bonuses
content:
All that hard work boosting high-performance vehicles is about to pay off, big time. Successfully completing any Vehicle Cargo Sell Missions between now and June 23rd will earn you double the usual GTA$ and RP.

Meanwhile, sourcing five or more vehicles by completing various Vehicle Cargo Steal Missions will also land you a bonus of GTA$250,000. Doubling up and bringing back ten or more will bump that up to a cool half a million. These bonuses will hit your Maze Bank account by June 30th.
